item.title: Correlogram
item.description: Correlogram is a type of chart that visualise the pairwise association between variables. StatsNotebook uses the ggpairs() function from the GGally library to build correlogram. A publication ready correlogram can be built within a few minutes with StatsNotebook. We use the built-in Personality dataset in this example. This dataset can be loaded into StatsNotebook using instruction here or can be downloaded from here. In this example, we will build a simple correlogram to visualise the relationship between four variables (three personality variables: Conscientiousness, Neuroticism, Openness and one mental health variable: Depression).
